name: PARK: Harajuku Crisis Team!
summary: Several years from now, the great cities of the world will be destroyed by creatures from another planet. Their next target is…Tokyo’s famed Harajuku district! Only a trio of treasure-seeking shop girls can hope to save the day. But first, do they have what it takes to become members of the PARK Harajuku: Crisis Team?
info:
• 出版社: Crunchyroll
  • 作者: たなか麦/PARK/Patrick Macias
  • 插图: たなか麦
  • 主页: http://www.crunchyroll.com/comics/manga/park-harajuku-crisis-team/volumes
  • 开始: 2015-05-28
